title: Error setting extended RDP property 'DeviceScaleFactor'
author: myesn
body_snippet:
**My computer operating system**: windows server 2008r2 Datacenter service pack 1
**Remote target computer operating system**: same as above
**Software version used**: 
mRemoteNG portable version
Version 1.77.1.27713

When I connect, the following error occurs:

WarningMsg
02/14/2020 12:27:59
Error setting extended RDP property 'DeviceScaleFactor'
Catastrophic failure (Exception from HRESULT: 0x8000FFFF (E_UNEXPECTED))

iterations.description: DeviceScaleFactor/DesktopScaleFactor extended properties fail on older RDP clients (pre-MsRdpClient9) with E_UNEXPECTED; the error is caught but still shown as a confusing warning to users

notes:
AI triage (claude): DeviceScaleFactor/DesktopScaleFactor extended properties fail on older RDP clients (pre-MsRdpClient9) with E_UNEXPECTED; the error is caught but still shown as a confusing warning to users
Approach: Guard SetExtendedProperty calls for DesktopScaleFactor and DeviceScaleFactor at line 1065-1066 with a version check (only set on RdpClient9+), or catch COMException with HRESULT 0x8000FFFF silently for these specific properties since they are non-essential
